mainText:
I had one person I wanted to meet in my life, and that one person was Steve Jobs. I'm only 17 and I know that it would be a slim shot to meet him, but I always just thought that I would meet him, my idol, my role model. Only if I was able to just talk to him for 5 minutes, that would mean the world, but at least he's making iPhones for God in heaven now.
Thomas Edison of our time is Steve Jobs.
author: Tyler
